h1_38: University of Wisconsin Hospitals and Clinics Program
h3_39: University of Wisconsin Hospitals and Clinics
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_81: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Residents have immediate access to LifeMatters, employee assistance & work/life program. Residents receive annual well-being benefit of $500 to use for personal wellness. We offer a $75 one-time membership to UWH fitness facilities for the entirety of their training program. Residents can take up to six (6) weeks of paid parental leave at birth, adoption, fostering, or legal guardianship. Procedure experience is available to residents in most sections, not just during interventional rotations.

p_365: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
